nodes.text: Battle of the Makem system  (Great Sith War)

A battle was a battle of the Great Sith War, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, wa fought in 3996 BBY. At the Makem system, the two sides fought with the Sith emerging as the victors.

The battle is only referenced once in The Essential Atlas. It is marked on a galactic map showing the course of the Great Sith War rather than described in prose. In the Atlas, the Makem system is denoted as the "Makem Te system" after the planet of Makem Te, which it contains.
